attributes.action: have road sensors that make vehicles stick to the speed limits on major roads and motorways
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to see if the prime minister could get a speed road sensor put in place on all motorways , majors roads and built up area more so near schools .... you drive over the sensor and the chip in your car makes you go no more than the speed limit whats the point of having a 30 mph sign up near a school and all drivers are doing 60 mph and the school wonders why we dont allow our kids to walk to school .... and on motorways same thing but also a distance sensor too no more than 2 car distance between you and the car in front ..... This would save money and help ease the NHS and Insurnce companies ........

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
